Title: The Truth About Charlie
Writer: Peter Stone (based on the motion picture "Charade" screenplay by), Jonathan Demme (screenplay), Steve Schmidt (screenplay), Peter Stone (screenplay), Jessica Bendinger (screenplay)
Actors: Olga Sékulic, Stephen Dillane, Françoise Bertin, Thandie Newton
Plot: A young woman in Paris is about to divorce her husband when she discovers... he's dead; and all their money is gone. She meets a mysterious man, who tells her that the money was really his, and he wants it back, seemingly convinced that she's hiding the cash. Meanwhile, more people end up dead...
